      P(value|target) = P(target^value)/P(target) P(A_i=c_j|c_k) = (n_ijk + 1) / (n_k + s_i) n_ijk: number of examples in c_k where A_i = v_j n_k: number of example in c_k s_i: number of possible values for A_i.

      • condProbLaplaceSmooth

        public static double condProbLaplaceSmooth(java.lang.String[] values,
                           java.lang.String[] instancesClass,
                           java.lang.String value,
                           java.lang.String target,
                           int nAttributeClass)
        P(value|target) = P(target^value)/P(target) P(A_i=c_j|c_k) = (n_ijk + 1) / (n_k + s_i) n_ijk: number of examples in c_k where A_i = v_j n_k: number of example in c_k s_i: number of possible values for A_i.
        Parameters:
        values - the values
        instancesClass - the instances class
        value - the value
        target - the target
        nAttributeClass - the n attribute class
        Returns:
        the double
